links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
mathematica: Flatten[Table[Prime[Range[PrimePi[6 * 10^n] + 1, PrimePi[7 * 10^n]]], {n, 3}]] (* _Alonso del Arte_, Jul 19 2014 *)Select[Table[Prime[n],{n, 7000}], First[IntegerDigits[#]]==6 &] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 08 2014 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(10^4) | Intseq(p)[#Intseq(p)] eq 6]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Jul 19 2014
author: _Felice Russo_
